message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $145.  I think it's a great deal and would be very valuable to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $130 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $130.  Would you consider $138?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $138 price point. Could we discuss a price closer to $125?
